title: Overactive bladder
summary: Overactive bladder (OAB) is a condition where there is a frequent feeling of needing to urinate to a degree that it negatively affects a person's life.[1] The frequent need to urinate may occur during the day, at night, or both.[5] If there is loss of bladder control then it is known as urge incontinence.[3] More than 40% of people with overactive bladder have incontinence.[2] Conversely, about 40% to 70% of urinary incontinence is due to overactive bladder.[6] Overactive bladder is not life-threatening,[3] but most people with the condition have problems for years.[3]
